thread.title: Johnny Depp does not wish to win Oscar ever
thread.title_full: Johnny Depp does not wish to win Oscar ever | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Johnny Depp does not wish to win Oscar ever
text:
Other Articles Study sheds light on culinary habits of Stonehenge builders 'Fantasy Island' to get reboot with female protagonist Leonardo DiCaprio to make movie on Volkswagen scandal Every actor aspires to win the Oscar trophy someday, but Hollywood star Johnny Depp is not interested in winning the top showbiz award.
The 52-year-old American actor, who is receiving a lot of critical praise for his portrayal of Boston gangster Whitey Bulger in “Black Mass”, says he is not in competition with anybody, reported Entertainment Weekly.
“I don’t want to win one of those things, ever, you know. I don’t want to have to talk. They gave me one of those things, like a nomination, two or three times. A nomination is plenty.
“The idea of winning means that you’re in competition with someone, and I’m not in competition with anybody. I just stick to my guns and do what I want to do. Sometimes people don’t like it, but that’s all right,” Depp said.
Apart from Oscar, the other thing that the “Charlie and the Chocolate Factory” is allergic to is, “comeback”.
“What did I come back from? The dead? I haven’t done anything different in this than I have in any other film,” he said.
 15, 2015 12:55 am
